sentence.Network_en: The next day he'd be full of contrition, weeping and begging forgiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 第二天，他就会懊悔不已，哭着乞求原谅。

sentence.Network_en: She forgave him because his contrition was real.
sentence.Network_cn: 她原谅了他是由于他的懊悔是真心的。

sentence.Network_en: In contrition she expatiated on the beauty of the garden.
sentence.Network_cn: 在后悔中,她反复谈论着花园的美丽.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(30) ... contrite 后悔的 contrition 悔悟 contrivable 可发明的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... apparition 幽灵，神奇的现象 contrition 悔罪，痛悔 attrition 消磨，磨损.

list.abs: God gives the gospel to make contrite sinners confident of salvation and eternal life ., 神的福音使悔过的罪人对救恩与永生充满信心.
东帝汶East Timor表示悔意expressing contrition阻止抢掠bring the looting under control
his contrite tears moved his mother ., 他悔悟的眼泪感动了母亲.
contritelycontrition contrivance 器具装置contrive 发明设计创作图谋企图计谋筹谋策划设法.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from late Latin contritio(n-), from contrit- 'ground down', from the verb conterere (see contrite)

entry.tran: 深感懊悔的;痛悔的;悔悟的
entry.def: If you are contrite, you are very sorry because you have done something wrong.

example.ex: She was instantly contrite. 'Oh, I am sorry! You must forgive me.'
example.tran: 她马上就懊悔了。“哦，我很抱歉！你一定要原谅我。”

means.word_mean: 1. sorrow for sin arising from fear of damnation

auth_sentence.content: There have been many acts of contrition and compensation.
auth_sentence.res_content: There have been many acts of contrition and compensation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There have been many acts of contrition and compensation.

auth_sentence.content: He was never going to offer the contrition Roberto Mancini expected.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was never going to offer the contrition Roberto Mancini expected.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was never going to offer the contrition Roberto Mancini expected.

auth_sentence.content: He lacked humility, he lacked contrition, he lacked easy humanity.
auth_sentence.res_content: He lacked humility, he lacked contrition, he lacked easy humanity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He lacked humility, he lacked contrition, he lacked easy humanity.

sentences.en: with a humble and contrite heart
sentences.cn: 怀着谦恭并悔罪的心情
